unsupportedAttachment.message: Nepodržana vrsta privitka. Kliknite za spremanje.

settings.description: Menu item and header for global settings

incomingKeyConflict.message: Primljena poruka s nepoznatim ključem identiteta. Kliknite za obradu i prikaz.

installComputerName.description: Text displayed before the input where the user can enter the name for this device.

gotIt.description: Label for a button that dismisses a dialog. The user clicks it to confirm that they understand the message in the dialog.

resetSession.description: This is a menu item for resetting the session, using the imperative case, as in a command.

notificationSettingsDialog.message: Kad poruka dođe, prikaži obavijesti koje otkrivaju:
notificationSettingsDialog.description: Explain the purpose of the notification settings

deleteMessages.description: Menu item for deleting messages, title case.

selectAContact.message: Odaberite kontakt ili grupu za početak dopisivanja.

installConnecting.description: Displayed when waiting for the QR Code

verifyContact.message: Možda bi htjeli $tag_start$ provjeriti $tag_end$ ovaj kontakt.
verifyContact.description: Use $tag_start$ and $tag_end$ to wrap the word or phrase in this sentence that the user should click on in order to navigate to the verification screen. These placeholders will be replaced with appropriate HTML code.

sent.description: Label for the time a message was sent

newMessage.description: Displayed in notifications for only 1 message

nameOnly.description: Label for setting notifications to display sender name only

from.description: Label for the sender of a message

debugLogExplanation.message: Ovaj će zapis biti objavljen javno na internetu, doprinositeljima na uvid. Možete ga provjeriti i urediti prije slanja.

searchForPeopleOrGroups.description: Placeholder text in the search input

noNameOrMessage.description: Label for setting notifications to display no name and no message text

installFollowUs.message: Pratite nas za novosti o podršci za više uređaja na iOS-u.

installTooManyDevices.message: Žao nam je, imate već previše povezanih uređaja. Pokušajte ukloniti neke.

installTagline.message: Privatnost je moguća. Signal je čini lakom.
installTagline.description: Tagline displayed under installWelcome on the install page

received.description: Label for the time a message was received

sendMessage.description: Placeholder text in the message entry field

outgoingKeyConflict.message: Promijenio se ključ identiteta ove osobe. Kliknite za obradu i prikaz.

fileSizeWarning.message: Žao nam je, odabrana datoteka nadmašuje ograničenja veličine poruke.

installAndroidInstructions.message: Otvorite Signal na vašem mobilnom telefonu i otvorite Postavke > Uređaji. Pritisnite gumb za dodavanje novog uređaja, zatim skenirajte kôd iznad.

installWelcome.description: Welcome title on the install page

installConnectionFailed.description: Displayed when we can't connect to the server.

installIHaveSignalButton.description: Button for the user to confirm that they have Signal for Android

sessionEnded.description: This is a past tense, informational message. In other words, your secure session has been reset.

installSignalLink.message:
Prvo, instalirajte Signal na Vaš Android telefon.
Mi ćemo povezati Vaše uređaje i održati Vaše poruke sinkroniziranima.
installSignalLink.description: Prompt the user to install Signal on Android before linking

installLinkingWithNumber.description: Text displayed before the phone number that the user is in the process of linking with

theirIdentity.description: They is used here as a gender-neutral third-person singular

newMessages.description: Displayed in notifications for multiple messages

theirIdentityUnknown.message: Niste još razmijenili poruke s ovim kontaktom. Njegov identitet će biti dostupan nakon prve poruke.

to.description: Label for the receiver of a message

installFinalButton.description: The final button for the install process, after the user has entered a name for their device

nameAndMessage.description: Label for setting notifications to display name and message text

failedToSend.message: Nije uspjelo slanje nekim primateljima. Provjerite svoju mrežnu vezu.

identityChanged.message: Ključ identiteta ovog kontakta se promjenio. Ovo može značiti da netko pokušava presresti Vašu komunikaciju ili da je taj kontakt jednostavno ponovno instalirao Signal i sad ima novi ključ identiteta.

submitDebugLog.description: Menu item and header text for debug log modal, title case.
